member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RoutePatternParser_InfiniteLoop
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Infinite loop detected in the parser..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_CannotHaveCatchAllInMultiSegment
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A path segment that contains more than one section, such as a literal section or a parameter, cannot contain a catch-all parameter..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_CannotHaveConsecutiveParameters
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A path segment cannot contain two consecutive parameters. They must be separated by a '/' or by a literal string..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_CannotHaveConsecutiveSeparators
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route template separator character '/' cannot appear consecutively. It must be separated by either a parameter or a literal value..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_CannotHaveDefaultValueSpecifiedInlineAndExplicitly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route parameter '{0}' has both an inline default value and an explicit default value specified. A route parameter cannot contain an inline default value when a default value is specified explicitly. Consider removing one of them..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_CatchAllCannotBeOptional
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A catch-all parameter cannot be marked optional..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_CatchAllMustBeLast
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A catch-all parameter can only appear as the last segment of the route template..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_Invalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route template cannot start with a '~' character unless followed by a '/'..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_InvalidConstraintReference
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid constraint '{0}'. A constraint must be of type 'string' or '{1}'..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_InvalidLiteral
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The literal section '{0}' is invalid. Literal sections cannot contain the '?' character..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_InvalidParameterName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route parameter name '{0}' is invalid. Route parameter names must be non-empty and cannot contain these characters: '{{', '}}', '/'. The '?' character marks a parameter as optional, and can occur only at the end of the parameter. The '*' character marks a parameter as catch-all, and can occur only at the start of the parameter..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_MaxAllowedSegmentsExceeded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Route exceeds the maximum number of allowed segments of 28 and is unable to be processed..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_MismatchedParameter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is an incomplete parameter in the route template. Check that each '{' character has a matching '}' character..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_OptionalCannotHaveDefaultValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An optional parameter cannot have default value..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_OptionalParameterCanbBePrecededByPeriod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to In the segment '{0}', the optional parameter '{1}' is preceded by an invalid segment '{2}'. Only a period (.) can precede an optional parameter..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_OptionalParameterHasToBeTheLast
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An optional parameter must be at the end of the segment. In the segment '{0}', optional parameter '{1}' is followed by '{2}'..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_ParameterOrDefaultValueNotFoundForRequiredValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No corresponding parameter or default value could be found for the required value '{0}={1}'. A non-null required value must correspond to a route parameter or the route pattern must have a matching default value..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_RepeatedParameter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route parameter name '{0}' appears more than one time in the route template..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplate_UnescapedBrace
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to In a route parameter, '{' and '}' must be escaped with '{{' and '}}'..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_RouteTemplateResolver_InvalidRouteTemplate
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified route template is invalid..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_Exception_ServiceError_SpecifiedOperationResultIsNotAnError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified operation result does not describe an error..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_RouteValueDictionary_DuplicateKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An element with the key '{0}' already exists in the {1}..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_RouteValueDictionary_DuplicatePropertyName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type '{0}' defines properties '{1}' and '{2}' which differ only by casing. This is not supported by {3} which uses case-insensitive comparisons..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_RouteValueDictionary_InvalidArrayIndex
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified array index is invalid..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Properties.Resources.RES_ServiceError_Unspecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unspecified error..

member.summary: Adds an item to the backing array, without checking if there is room.
member.remarks: Use this method if you know there is enough space in the for another item, and you are writing performance-sensitive code.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern
member.summary: Represents a parsed route template with default values and constraints. Use to create instances. Instances of are immutable.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern.Defaults
member.summary: Gets the set of default values for the route pattern. The keys of are the route parameter names.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern.ParameterPolicies
member.summary: Gets the set of parameter policy references for the route pattern. The keys of are the route parameter names.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern.RequiredValues
member.summary: Gets a collection of route values that must be provided for this route pattern to be considered applicable.

remarks.para:
allows a framework to substitute route values into a parameterized template so that the same route template specification can be used to create multiple route patterns.
This example shows how a route template can be used with required values to substitute known route values for parameters.
Route Template: "{controller=Home}/{action=Index}/{id?}" Route Values: { controller = "Store", action = "Index" }
A route pattern produced in this way will match and generate URL paths like: /Store, /Store/Index, and /Store/Index/17.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern.InboundPrecedence
member.summary: Gets the precedence value of the route pattern for URL matching.
member.remarks: Precedence is a computed value based on the structure of the route pattern used for building URL matching data structures.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern.OutboundPrecedence
member.summary: Gets the precedence value of the route pattern for URL generation.
member.remarks: Precedence is a computed value based on the structure of the route pattern used for building URL generation data structures.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern.RawText
member.summary: Gets the raw text supplied when parsing the route pattern. May be null.

member.summary: Gets the list of route parameters.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePattern.PathSegments
member.summary: Gets the list of path segments.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The raw text supplied when parsing the route pattern. May be null.
The default values for the route pattern.
The set of parameter policy references for the route pattern.
A collection of route values that must be provided for this route pattern to be considered applicable.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RoutePatternSeparatorPart
member.summary: Represents an optional separator part of a route pattern. Instances of are immutable.

remarks.para: An optional separator is a literal text delimiter that appears between two parameter parts in the last segment of a route pattern. The only separator that is recognized is ..

para.example: In the route pattern /{controller}/{action}/{id?}.{extension?} the . character is an optional separator.

remarks.para: An optional separator character does not need to present in the URL path of a request for the route pattern to match.

member.summary: Gets the text content of the part.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RouteValueDictionary.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An object to initialize the dictionary. The value can be of type or or an object with public properties as key-value pairs.
member.remarks: If the value is a dictionary or other of , then its entries are copied. Otherwise the object is interpreted as a set of key-value pairs where the property names are keys, and property values are the values, and copied into the dictionary. Only public instance non-index properties are considered.

member.summary: Attempts to remove and return the value that has the specified key from the .
member.param: The key of the element to remove and return.
When this method returns, contains the object removed from the , or null if key does not exist.
member.returns: true if the object was removed successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RouteValueDictionary.TryAdd(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to the add the provided and to the dictionary.
member.returns: Returns true if the value was added. Returns false if the key was already present.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.Internal.RouteValueEqualityComparer
member.summary: Defines an implementation that compares objects as-if they were route value strings.
member.remarks: Values that are are not strings are converted to strings using Convert.ToString(x, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture). null values are converted to the empty string. strings are compared using .

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.RouteTemplateResolver
member.summary: Allows resolving routes from route templates and route values. The route templates should follow the MVC rules but routes with query strings, such as those used to perform requests, will also be resolved.
member.example:
A route can be resolved as in the following example:
string requestUri = RouteTemplatesResolver.Resolve( "/api/v{version:apiVersion/files/{category=rh}/{path?}?pageIndex={pageIndex}&pageSize={pageSize}", new { Version = 4, Category = "accounting", PageIndex = 2, PageSize = 50 });
The result would be:
"/api/v4/files/accounting?pageIndex=2&pageSize=50"

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.RouteTemplateResolver.Resolve(System.String)
member.summary: Resolves the specified route template considering optional arguments and arguments default values.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.RouteTemplateResolver.Resolve(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Resolves the specified route template by applying the route values.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.RouteTemplateResolver.Resolve(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Resolves the specified route template by applying the route values.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Routing.RouteTemplateResolver.Resolve(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Resolves the specified route template by applying the route values.

member.summary: Describes a request to create a new webhook subscription.

member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the client application that is subscribing the webhook.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the webhooks events that should be subscribed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the secret that should be used to sign the payloads.

member.summary: Gets or sets a set of additional properties associated with the webhook subscription.
member.remarks: These properties can be used to implement custom behavior on the applications producing webhooks (when associated with events, for example).

member.summary: Gets or sets the secret that should be used to sign the payloads.

member.summary: Gets or sets the response message.

member.summary: Gets or sets the response timestamp.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionLastResponse.Tries
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times the callback action was tried after the last time it succeeded.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionResponseStatus
member.summary: Describes the status of a response from a webhook subscription callback action.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionResponseStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The status is unknown.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionResponseStatus.Unused
member.summary: The callback action was never invoked (none of the webhook events have been raised since the subscription was created).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionResponseStatus.Succeeded
member.summary: The callback action succeeded.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionResponseStatus.Failed
member.summary: The callback action failed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionResponseStatus.Timeout
member.summary: The callback action timed out.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Rest.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionResponseStatus.InternalError
member.summary: The callback action failed because of an internal error.
